Title: Testing NGINX as MySQL Galera Cluster Load Balancer
Description:
1) Terminal 1 (top left): iptables PREROUTING chain output
2) Terminal 2 (top right): Mysql error log for g1.local
3) Terminal 3 (middle left): Application output when connecting to nginx load balancer
4) Terminal 4 (middle right): Output of /var/log/mysqlchk_iptables
5) Terminal 5 (bottom left): Output of read_only and wsrep_sst_method on g1.local
6) Terminal 6 (bottom right): Action console
